Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "It's getting late. I'll leave the rest of the work to you, is that alright?", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're leaving already?", 3: '6', 4: "Can't you help me out?", 5: '6'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Taking proper rests is important too! Not that I can help you with Gray Raven business, anyway.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'You should be familiar with the process and preparations for connections as well. So go connect now!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie2New.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie2New.prefab'}
{2: 'Good evening.', 3: '14', 4: 'What are you doing, Liv?', 5: '14'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Good eveningâ€”why are you connecting with me at this hour, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm just sorting out the documents. Some new files got sent to us halfway through.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "They're related to the base. You just have to verify them after I'm done, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'That should have been my job.', 3: '18', 4: 'You can leave this to me.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The connection handbook doesn't recommend commandants working late at night, so please allow me to take care of these trivial matters for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Constructs don't need sleep, but you don't come with a frame like ours, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "And didn't I just tell you to go rest? Why are you still connecting with me at this hour, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I decided to take on the paperwork so that you can improve your wellbeing. If you still insist on overworking yourself...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Then everything I did was in vain.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "So, please disconnect now, Commandant. I'd have to sever the connection either way lest my efficiency drops.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Just... stop bothering me, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
